successes.title: Modbook Pro X â€” 15.4" Retina Quad-Core Mac OS X Tablet
successes.description: Unleash your creativity with the most innovative and powerful pen tablet ever, the Mac-based 15.4-inch Retina display Modbook Pro X.

Pledges.description: Our sincere thanks for your help in making the Modbook Pro X a reality. You will receive exclusive Backer-only project updates and access to Backer-only promotions.

In addition to our sincere thanks, exclusive Backer-only project updates and access to Backer-only promotions, your name will be permanently memorialized along with a link to your Kickstarter profile on our Wall of Fame at modbook.com.

Get a Modbook Digitizer Pen, featuring a dual side-switch, eraser, and support for up to 1,024 levels of pen pressure sensitivity. We'll include a Pen tip removal tool and 11 spare pen tips. (See the Rewards section on the bottom left of this page for a list of supported devices.)

Get a Modbook Shuttle featuring a sleek anodized aluminum enclosure, 750GB hard disk drive, FireWire 800 and USB 3.0 ports, and including USB cable and DC power adapter. (See Rewards section at the bottom left for more info)

Get a Modbook Shuttle featuring a sleek anodized aluminum enclosure, 2TB hard disk drive, FireWire 800 and USB 3.0 ports, and including USB cable and DC power adapter. (See Rewards section at the bottom left for more info)

Get a broadcast-grade 480GB solid-state drive Modbook Shuttle featuring a sleek anodized aluminum enclosure, FireWire 800 and USB 3.0 ports, and including USB cable and DC power adapter. (See Rewards section at the bottom left for more info)

Get your late-2013, Mid 2014, or newer 15.4-inch Retina display MacBook Pro transformed into a Modbook Pro X! You are saving close to a quarter off of the estimated $2,599 retail price. (This reward DOES NOT include Keyboard Stand or Eyes-Free Keybars.) You will need to send in your MacBook Pro or purchase a new one from our online store about four weeks before your estimated ship date. You will also be able to purchase further upgrades (e.g., to 32GB RAM) as we prepare to build your machine. (See Rewards section at the bottom left for more info)

Get your late-2013, Mid 2014,  or newer 15.4-inch Retina display MacBook Pro transformed into a Modbook Pro X complete with the Eyes-Free Keybars. You are saving close to a quarter off of the estimated $2,999 retail price. (This reward DOES NOT include Keyboard Stand.) You will need to send in your MacBook Pro or purchase a new one from our online store about four weeks before your estimated ship date. You will also be able to purchase further upgrades (e.g., to 32GB RAM) as we prepare to build your machine. (See Rewards section at the bottom left for more info)
